A lot of HTML-forms look like this:
<form action="hjemmeside_kontakt.asp" method="post" name="form" 
onsubmit="return check()">

It seems that heritrix finds the link to hjemmeside_kontakt.asp - can 
anyone tell me which default extractor does this ?

Would it be possible to filter out links found in form-elements that 
have method="post"

I just go an email from an angry webmaster that had just recieved 11.000 
emails due to this script.

The asp-script should not send emails on get-requests - but it does and 
we're afraid a lot of scripts out there does that.

best
